name: Aoiti's Atoll Paradise Editor
description:
Objective:

Create your atoll paradise using forces of nature and enjoy the weather simulations and biosphere expansion.

If you wanna share what you make, please do so.

Just use "Shift+K" to save a screenshot to your pictures folder, or use snipping tool. Then send as a comment to this page. Maybe we can vote  for the best later.

Also I will appreciate if you follow me on itch or youtube

Keys:

Right mouse button hold: tectonic shift

Right mouse button click: volcano 

Left mouse button click: meteorite 

Shift+K: save screenshot to MyPictures

WASD keys or middle mouse button: rotate camera 

RF keys or mouse wheel: zoom in/out

P: pause

Credits:

Programming and Design - Aoiti (me)

Models - asteroid: VK GAMEDEV, trees: BROKEN VECTOR

Music - Rafael Krux, Alexander Nakarada and Komiku

Min requirements:

Due to underlaying weather simulations, you will need extra processing power.

At least 6 core Ryzen 1st gen or Intel 6th gen or better.

Dedicated graphics card

A Mouse
